{"id":1061938571,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1695960245,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"125 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1061938571/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotonic Array","memory":"96.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isMonotonic(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n=nums.size();\n        bool increasing=false,set=false;\n        for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++) {\n            if(nums[i]==nums[i+1]) continue;\n            if(!set){\n                if(nums[i]<nums[i+1]) increasing=true;\n                set=true;\n            }\n            if(set && ((nums[i]<nums[i+1] && !increasing) || (nums[i]>nums[i+1] && increasing))) return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotonic-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
